name: Polar H10 Heart Rate Monitor Chest Strap - ANT + Bluetooth, Waterproof HR Sensor for Men and Women

WORKS WITH EVERYTHING: Polar HRM works with ALL HRM compatible Equipment.

Usage Tips - 1: Please moisten the plastic electrode zones of the chest strap before use. 2. Please connect the heart rate sensor in the App instead of phone bluetooth.
